name: Portals- Apple Match It!
description:
You are stuck in a forest with 3 portals.

Each portal changes the  forest.

GREEN FOREST - DESERT FOREST - ROTTING FOREST

There are 5 apples

Each apple changes as you go through the portals

WILL YOU BE ABLE TO MATCH THE 5 APPLES TO CONQUER THE FOREST??

-

Made during the The 2021 Community Jam
